article_node.title: Thai Shares Tipped To Open To The Upside On Monday
article_node.summary: The Thai stock market recovered, with the SET closing at 1,253.39, up 0.69% after a four‑day slump. Global markets were upbeat, with U.S. indices rising and Asian bourses expected to follow. Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s speech at Jackson Hole bolstered confidence that the Fed will cut rates next month, raising the FedWatch probability to 83%. Crude oil prices ticked up modestly to $63.65 per barrel amid stalled Russia‑Ukraine peace talks.
